p: Leaves of 4 weeks old Nicotiana benthamiana plants were used for agrobacterium-mediated infiltration as described by Wydro et al. ( 2006). The ORF sequence of each gene was cloned into pCambia1301 vector and the GFP fusion constructs were used for transient expression. Infiltrated leaves were mounted on slides and imaged using a confocal laser-scanning microscope (Nikon C2-ER) with a standard filter set. The empty GFP vector was used as control.
